map_description: A visualization of the digital frontier known as the Astradigital Ocean

regions.name: MAGMASOX Territory
regions.description: The technological core of the Astradigital Ocean, home to advanced digital constructs and experimental code.

regions.name: Kaznak Voyagers Territory
regions.description: The nomadic data collectors' shifting territory, filled with rare artifacts and data streams.

points_of_interest.name: MAGMASOX HQ
points_of_interest.description: Central command and innovation hub of the MAGMASOX faction.

points_of_interest.name: Kaznak Outpost
points_of_interest.description: Primary outpost and trading hub for the Kaznak Voyagers.

points_of_interest.name: Ancient Data Artifact
points_of_interest.description: A mysterious data structure of unknown origin, emanating strange code patterns.

pathways.name: Main Datastream
pathways.description: Principal digital highway connecting the major territories.

factions.name: MAGMASOX
factions.description: The technological innovators of the Astradigital Ocean, masters of digital transformation and boundary-pushing experimentation.

factions.name: Kaznak Voyagers
factions.description: Nomadic explorers of the digital frontier, collectors of rare data artifacts and chroniclers of the Astradigital Ocean.
